Text: Thanks for the quality upload.  I have to say one thing though, there is no blu ray as of yet so your description should cite another source ;)

Two things I noticed:
1. "Disney HD Cinemagic" channel watermark is present.
2. character voices only play from the Left speakers.  Music plays on both L/R.  
Overall, a musical with skewed audio is weird.
I play this on my computer and it's in English and then when I burned it on my dvd player it played in german... did it burn incorrectly?
there are two audio tracks - try using your player controls to toggle between them - thank you for downloading - god bless!
Sound is weird, and kept dropping out during particular scenes. NOT worth the download.
